sentences.en: A friend said that he unable and now become able . These underpants are wonderful.
sentences.cn: 这位朋友说:我从“起不了”变为“了不起”,金冷裤神奇啊.

sentences.en: Afterward, they married give these to steal away their underpants'fish.
sentences.cn: 后来, 她们都嫁给了那些偷走她们裤衩的鱼.

sentences.en: Exceed person ability to wear underpants outside only?
sentences.cn: 难道只有超人才能把裤衩穿在外边 吗 ?

sentences.en: Half of men admit that their underpants are their oldest item of clothing.
sentences.cn: 一半的男人承认他们的内裤是他们最旧的衣物。

sentences.en: He stripped down to his underpants and leaped into the river.
sentences.cn: 他脱掉衣服,只穿一条短裤跳进了河里.

sentences.en: He walked in , bold as brass, wearing nothing but his underpants.
sentences.cn: 他走了进来, 只穿一条衬裤,极为厚颜无耻.

sentences.en: Must not wear short sleeve garment, underpants, barefoot to show a back to work.
sentences.cn: 不得穿短袖衣 、 裤衩 、 赤足露背作业.

sentences.en: She was dressed only in a vest and underpants.
sentences.cn: 她只穿了一件汗衫和一条短裤.

sentences.en: So he has made some underpants to his friends. The effect is also extremely good.
sentences.cn: 于是就做了几条金冷裤送给挚友, 效果同样了不得.

trans.tran_en: a short piece of underwear worn by men under their trousers
